about.title: Restoration Masters
about.aboutme: For over 4 years, we have been professionally engaged in the restoration of parquet and wooden decor elements in Moscow and the Moscow region. Services and restoration deadlines are discussed after viewing the object. Only professional chemistry is used during work: Ciranova, Bona, Konig, Berger. German equipment Lagler: Hummel, Trio, Flip.
about.works: Free visit to Moscow for consultation and preliminary inspection of the object. 500 rubles for Moscow region. Services and restoration deadlines are discussed after viewing the object.
about.order: To carry out sanding work, you pay for the materials, after which they are brought to the object. The minimum order is 15 meters.

advantages.card1_2: With local defects of the floor, it is possible to carry out parquet restoration. During parquet restoration, it is possible to replace a board, remove chips, cracks, dents, and stains. Applying a protective coating helps to extend the service life of the parquet.
advantages.card2_2: To create a beautiful floor pattern, we carry out work on parquet. They include parquet sanding. Filling chips, cracks, and deep scratches. In some cases, replacing boards. After which, the parquet is covered with oil or varnish.

contacts.wadesc: You can contact us via WhatsApp
contacts.phdesc: You can always call us from 9:00 to 21:00 Moscow time
contacts.map: We work in Moscow and the Moscow region. Visiting outside these areas is discussed individually.
